name: Thermage AI
goal: Visualize the effect of cosmetic surgeries
description: Created an Instruct Pix2Pix model that specializes in cosmetic surgeries

name: Matchmaker AI
goal: Build a RAG system for executive management
description: Designed an LLM-based enterprise RAG system that empowered business executives to efficiently search through thousands of internal documents.

name: Vitiligo Tracker AI
goal: Quantitatively measure vitiligo extent for clinical trial and patients' self assessment
description: Tracked treatment progress for over 500 vitiligo patients using deep learning and computer vision techniques.

name: Clinical Site Feasibility AI
goal: Build a ranking system to identify medical facilities for conducting clinical trials
description: Accelerated the clinical trial site selection process by 6 months through AI and deep learning methodologies.

name: Adverse Reaction NLP AI
goal: Develop an NLP system for automatic analysis of patient complaints about adverse reactions
description: Developed an AI-driven application for patient complaint analysis, leveraging NLP and deep learning, resulting in a 40\% reduction in manual data processing.

name: Audio Recognition AI
goal: Engineer an audio recognition app (like Spotify) for podcasts and music
description: Engineered an audio recognition app using cutting-edge AI embedding technology as a core product for a tech startup.

name: Enterprise Data Analytics
goal: Build a unified data analytics system for e-commerce website
description: Established a real-time e-commerce analytical system, delivering BI reports promptly and expediting decision-making by over 4 weeks.

name: CCPA Compliance
goal: Add capabilities to data plaform for CCPA privacy laws compliance
description: Introduced new features to data platform on Azure to handle requests related to CCPA compliance.

name: HVAC AI
goal: Build an AI based personalized in-car climate control system
description: Conceptualized an app that automatically adjusts climate controls in cars based on personal preferences, leading to safer and enhanced driving experience.

name: Predict Destination AI
goal: Predict driving destination when car starts
description: Pioneered a groundbreaking predictive model using historical geospatial data, enabling next-generation smart cars to accurately anticipate and adapt to drivers' destinations.

name: Generalized MFA
goal: Build a centralized MFA API for enterprise-wide security
description: Built an centralized MFA system, which standardized software security across the IT infrastructure.

name: Movie Studio Lighting Control
goal: Build a user friendly lighting array control system for movie studios
description: Designed a fully functional Raspberry-PI based control system that significantly enhanced the efficiency and speed of lighting setup in movie studios.

name: Predictive Energy
goal: Model the energy consumption of a data center for managing power consumption
description: Developed a robust system for estimating energy consumption in data centers, resulting in optimized resource allocation.

name: TPC-Express
goal: Develop an industry-wide big data benchmarking specification
description: Significantly enhanced the efficiency of next-generation data centers (DC 3.0) by implementing AI-driven strategies, leading to reduced operational costs and improved performance. Key contributor in establishing the industry-standard TPCx-IoT benchmark, facilitating fair and accurate performance comparisons across IoT platforms.

name: Enterprise analytics
goal: Build a platform for handling 20+ petabytes of enterprise data
description: Modernized the enterprise system managing 20+ petabytes of data using big data technologies, resulting in a 30\% reduction in operational costs.

name: Datacast
goal: Automate targeted ad campaigns for existing Xfinity customers
description: Designed an application to deliver targeted promotional offers based on customer behaviour.

name: SecOTA
goal: Securely deliver upgrades to Snapdragon chipset users over-the-air (OTA)
description: Developed an application for secure over-the-air (OTA) firmware upgrades, ensuring reliable and efficient delivery to end users.

name: Scanban
goal: Automate identification of security vulnerabilities acroos in enterprise code
description: Introduced an algorithm to automatically scan code repositories and report security vulnerabilities.

name: Spasticity detection
goal: Quantify Spasticity in elbow of Parkinson's patients
description: Implemented an algorithm to accurately measure the severity of Parkinson's disease, improving diagnostic precision. Devised a robotic arm for patient measurements and treatment analysis.
